title: Ultimate Macaroni & Cheese Casserole
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse. Drain again.

On a saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the flour and quickly whisk this mixture until the flour is completely cooked. Add the Cacique速 Crema Mexicana and milk. Mix with a wooden spoon over medium heat until the mixture starts bubbling. Add the nutmeg, cheese, salt and pepper. Mix until the cheese is completely melted. Check for seasoning

Add the pasta to the sauce and combine. Pour into a casserole dish. Sprinkle some more Cacique速 Manchego cheese on top. Place the casserole under the broiler until the mixture turns golden in color. About 3-4 minutes. Remove from the oven and serve.
